content: In the world of literature, who wrote the classic novel "Pride and Prejudice" that has been adapted into numerous films and TV series?

The classic novel "Pride and Prejudice" was written by Jane Austen. Published in 1813, it is one of her most famous works and has indeed been adapted into numerous films and television series over the years. The story revolves around Elizabeth Bennet and explores themes of love, marriage, and social class in 19th-century England.
